description:
Trust & Safety team members are tasked with identifying and taking on the biggest problems that challenge the safety and integrity of our products. They use technical know-how, excellent problem-solving skills, user insights, and proactive communication to protect users and our partners from abuse across Google products like Search, Maps, Gmail, and Google Ads. On this team, you're a big-picture thinker and strategic team-player with a passion for doing what’s right. You work globally and cross-functionally with Google engineers and product managers to identify and fight abuse and fraud cases at Google speed - with urgency. And you take pride in knowing that every day you are working hard to promote trust in Google and ensuring the highest levels of user safety.

The mission of the Trust and Safety Ad Traffic Quality team is to deliver a clean and trusted ads ecosystem. We do this by maintaining a policy compliant partner network and preventing invalid traffic (e.g., click, impression and conversion fraud). You will be solving complex problems across large data sets, bringing your analytical skills together with the power of Google’s technology to find non-compliant/invalid activity occurring on Google’s ad products and ensuring that advertisers are not charged for fraud. You will also work with product and engineering teams to make sure that new products and features provide a good, safe experience for users and advertisers.

On this team, you will be responsible for completing challenging fraud investigations, conducting complex data analyses and independently identifying opportunities to defend Google Ad products at scale. You are proactive, motivated, organized, responsible, innovative and thrive in a fast-paced environment. You understand the user's point of view and are passionate about using your technical, sales and customer service acumen to protect our users. You will work globally and cross-functionally to navigate challenging online safety situations and handle abuse and fraud cases.

At Google we work hard to earn our users’ trust every day. Trust & Safety is Google’s team of abuse fighting and user trust experts working daily to make the internet a safer place. We partner with teams across Google to deliver bold solutions in abuse areas such as malware, spam and account hijacking. A diverse team of Analysts, Policy Specialists, Engineers, and Program Managers, we work to reduce risk and fight abuse across all of Google’s products, protecting our users, advertisers, and publishers across the globe in over 40 languages.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, related field or equivalent practical experience.
  • 4 years of related work experience.
  • Experience with querying languages (MySQL, Dremel, etc.) and database structures.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with coding and scripting (Python, C++, Java).
  • Experience with fraud investigations, fraud risk management, Internet advertising or e-commerce.
  • Understanding of how the Internet works economically, socially and technically. Interest in innovation, technology and Google products.
  • Ability to mentor team members. Ability to work independently and complete projects on time.
  • Excellent written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills to clearly communicate technical concepts with multiple cross-regional and cross-functional stakeholders.
responsibilities:
• Analyze traffic/policy trends and identify new filters and flags to spot abuse.
  • Work directly with other members of the team to prevent complex abuse issues.
  • Review flagged entities for abuse manually.
  • Enhance our operational workflows via process improvements.
  • Participate in cross-functional projects with Product, Engineering and other enforcement teams to push for policy changes and close possible product issues that make Google products susceptible for abuse.
title: Lead Strategist, Ad Traffic Quality, Trust and Safety
